page.title: 15Local Events
page.content: During the course of a year there are many events taking place but few have any regular place on the calendar. Those that do ,however are worth making a note of: {January } Annual Amateur Pantomime {May } May Day Fun Run along the old Railway line. Mayor Making Ceremony. {June } Carnival Ceremonial visit by the Mayor of Sandwich. {August} Pyefleet Sailing Week Regatta Horticultural Society Show {September }Smack and Barge Race Opening of the Oyster fishery {November }Carnival Fireworks Display {December }Choosing Day for the Deputy of Brightlingsea
